Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 衛兵の声
Entry.EnglishText: Guard's Voice

Entry.JapaneseText: 衛兵
Entry.EnglishText: Guard

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥ
Entry.EnglishText: Walto

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: ここが、カレギア城。 遠い昔から現在に至るまでの カレギアの歴史の礎となった場所です。
Entry.EnglishText: This is Callegea Castle. It has served as the cornerstone of our kingdom from ancient times into the present day.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ここにクレアが……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire is in there...

Entry.JapaneseText: キィキィ……
Entry.EnglishText: Keekee...

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィには、このお城に クレアさんがいる事が わかるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I think Zapie seems to know that Claire is being held within the castle...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア、待っていろ。 必ず助け出す……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait for me, Claire. I'm going to get you out of there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヤツらが何を企んでるのか知らねえが、 どうせロクでもねえ事だ。 絶対にぶっつぶしてやる。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no clue what their plans are, but they can't be anything good. Let's give 'em what's coming to them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さんは お城の中へ入る方法を 知ってますか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, do you know of a way for us to get into the castle?

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん、私は正面から 普通に入る方法しか…… でも、<Eugene>なら……
Entry.EnglishText: No, I have always just walked in through the main entrance. But perhaps <Eugene>...

Entry.JapaneseText: いや…… カレギア城の守りは堅い。 決して楽に入り込む事は できないだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: No... The castle's defense is solid. There isn't going to be any easy way in.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、よく調べれば あるいは……
Entry.EnglishText: But if we do some investigating, then perhaps...

Entry.JapaneseText: 待てッ!! 待たんか!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wait! Stop right there!

Entry.JapaneseText: ん？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 絶対、逃がすな！
Entry.EnglishText: You're not getting away!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体どこから入ったんだ、 あの男……
Entry.EnglishText: Just how did he get in the castle, anyway...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下のお足元を汚した 不届き者を逃すな!! 手分けして探せ!!
Entry.EnglishText: That scoundrel has disgraced the ground upon which Her Majesty walks. Don't let him get away! Split up and search the area!

Entry.JapaneseText: あの男……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, it's him...

Entry.JapaneseText: 知ってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: You know him?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……まだあんな事を やっているのか……
Entry.EnglishText: I do, and I assume he's still up to his old tricks...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんな事？
Entry.EnglishText: Old tricks?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……あの男なら、 城への入り方を何か 知っているかもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: Actually, he may know of a way for us to sneak inside the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう事だよ？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you mean by that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 説明は後でする。 ヤツを追うんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll explain later. Let's follow him.

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつら……
Entry.EnglishText: Those guys are...

Entry.JapaneseText: まずい……
Entry.EnglishText: This is bad...

Entry.JapaneseText: 逃げようヨ……
Entry.EnglishText: Let's get outta here.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはまずい……
Entry.EnglishText: This way's no good.

Entry.JapaneseText: 逃げましょう……！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's leave!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、 ここはやべえぜ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey! This way's trouble!

Entry.JapaneseText: まずいわ…… 逃げましょう……
Entry.EnglishText: Not this way... Let's leave.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこの女、止まれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Halt, civilian.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい！ おまえ！ 止まるんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hey! You! Stop right there!

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくし？ なぜです!?
Entry.EnglishText: Me? Why?

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜ？ 当たり前だ。 ここは関係者以外、立ち入り禁止だ。 さぁ、帰った帰った。
Entry.EnglishText: Why? Obviously, this area is off limits to unauthorized personnel. Now, leave this place immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: よせ!! 押し入る気なら 捕まえるぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Leave! Or I will arrest you for trespassing!

Entry.JapaneseText: 無礼者! 離しなさい!!
Entry.EnglishText: What insolence! Unhand me at once!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何事か！
Entry.EnglishText: What's going on here?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト……！
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 見てください、 わたくしは……
Entry.EnglishText: Look at me, I am...

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜここへ来た!? ……帰れ！ いますぐ立ち去れ!! そして二度とここへは姿を見せるな！
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing here?! ...Leave! Leave this instant! And don't let me catch you here again!

Entry.JapaneseText: ち、違います!! わたくしはア……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-You are mistaken! It is me, Ag—...

Entry.JapaneseText: 黙れ！
Entry.EnglishText: Silence!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんな事になったのは、 陛下ご自身にも非はある…… しかし、私はそれでもおまえたちを…… 許す事はできない……
Entry.EnglishText: I realize that Her Majesty shares responsibility for what happened. Nevertheless, I cannot bring myself to forgive you people.

Entry.JapaneseText: できる事なら、おまえたち全員、 この手で葬ってやりたい。 だが、復讐に剣を抜く事はない。 カレギア軍の誇りにかけて……
Entry.EnglishText: If I could, I would send you all to the great beyond with my own hands. However, my sword is not to be used for vengeance. I swear on my pride as a Callegean Knight.
Entry.Notes: So, I actually think the wording here is slightly clunky at the beginning. Maybe instead of "If I could", a "Were it up to me" would work better. cause it kinda sounds like he's saying "If I could forgive you", which I know isn't right. anyways, something to consider. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わ、わたくしは……
Entry.EnglishText: But...I am...

Entry.JapaneseText: いますぐ立ち去れ。
Entry.EnglishText: Leave this place immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 待って！ ミルハウスト!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wait! Milhaust!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、国内は、混乱を極めている。 些細な問題さえ、大事になりかねない。 城の玄関を預かる者として、並々ならぬ 自覚を持って警備に当たってもらいたい。
Entry.EnglishText: Chaos is spreading throughout the kingdom as we speak. Even the most trivial of matters are becoming critical. As those charged with protecting the castle, I command you to remain vigilant.

Entry.JapaneseText: はっ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, sir!

Entry.JapaneseText: はっ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, sir!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ミルハウスト……
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの民間人が 城に何の用だ？
Entry.EnglishText: What business does a Huma civilian have at the castle?

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ…… ジルバ・マディガン様に お話があります。
Entry.EnglishText: I must speak with Zilv-... With Lady Zilva Madigan.

Entry.JapaneseText: 話なら俺が聞いてやる。
Entry.EnglishText: If you have something to say, then I'll hear it.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの方以外に、 お話しする事はできません。
Entry.EnglishText: I cannot speak with anyone but her.

Entry.JapaneseText: これは国の大事に 関わる話なのです。
Entry.EnglishText: It is a matter of grave importance to the Kingdom.

Entry.JapaneseText: この小娘が、 ヒューマのくせに……!!
Entry.EnglishText: You have a lot of nerve for a Huma, you wench!

Entry.JapaneseText: 危険な発言だなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: A rather precarious choice of words, don't you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あなたは……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-You're...

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア軍の兵士ともあろう者が、 種族主義をあおるような事を 言うのはどうだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: What sort of consequences do you think there might be for a Callegean Soldier if they were caught making racist remarks?

Entry.JapaneseText: し、失礼しました。
Entry.EnglishText: M-My apologies, sir!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふっ…… 別に僕はかまわないけど。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph... Not like I particularly care about such a thing.

Entry.JapaneseText: それより、 彼女を通してやってくれないか？ 彼女は僕の知り合いなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well anyhow, would you kindly let this young lady through? She is an acquaintance of mine.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、警備担当としましては、 素性の知れない民間人を通す事は……
Entry.EnglishText: But we've been instructed by the head of security to deny entry to any unidentified civilians...

Entry.JapaneseText: しかも、<Yellow>ヒューマの小娘<White>で、 ヒューマの僕の知り合いだから？
Entry.EnglishText: What, you can't let this <Yellow>Huma wench<White> through because she's associated with a Huma like me?

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、入って。 久しぶりだね、<Red>クレア<White>ちゃん。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come on in. It's been far too long, my dear <Red>Claire<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何とかしなくては……
Entry.EnglishText: I need to do something about this...

Entry.JapaneseText: 祭りは楽しかったですか？ アガーテ様。
Entry.EnglishText: Did you enjoy the festivities, Queen Agarte?

Entry.JapaneseText: 教えて、サレ。 ジルバはどうして あのような事を？
Entry.EnglishText: Tell me, Saleh. What possessed Zilva to say such things?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ふふふふ…… あれがジルバ様の正体ですよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hehehe... What you have just witnessed was the true Zilva.

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ？
Entry.EnglishText: What?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの場所に立つために、 色々やってたじゃないですか？
Entry.EnglishText: She's done quite a lot to secure her position, hasn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様をそそのかしたり、 儀式を行ったり……
Entry.EnglishText: She enticed Your Majesty, and had you perform the ritual, and...

Entry.JapaneseText: そ、そんな…… まさか、ジルバが……
Entry.EnglishText: Th-That can't be... To think that she would...

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、遅かれ早かれ、 ヒューマとガジュマの 全面対決になるでしょうね。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, it looks like an all-out war between Huma and Gajuma will soon commence.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ……あのジルバが……
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva... Zilva has...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>の心なんてあてにならない。 そんなものを信じた あなたが悪いんです。
Entry.EnglishText: It's your fault for believing in something as untrustworthy as the hearts of <Yellow>Men<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: フフフ……どんな気分です？
Entry.EnglishText: Hehehe... How does it feel?

Entry.JapaneseText: 他人を信じたあげくが、 地位も身体も失って、無一文。
Entry.EnglishText: Placing your trust in another has cost you not only your place in society, but your body as well. Now you have nothing.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あ、欲しかった身体は 手に入ったんでしたっけ？ 手に入らなかったのは、あの人の……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah! But you did in fact get your hands on the body you had so desired, did you not? Too bad a certain someone was still outside your grasp...

Entry.JapaneseText: やめて！
Entry.EnglishText: Enough!

Entry.JapaneseText: フフッ……これからどうなさる おつもりですか、アガーテ様？
Entry.EnglishText: Hehe... What do you plan on doing now, Queen Agarte?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたくしは…… わたくしにできる事を やるだけ……
Entry.EnglishText: I... I will just do what I can...

Entry.JapaneseText: おや……少し見ないうちに、 女王らしくなったんじゃありませんか？ ラドラス様にも見せてあげたかったなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Goodness. Dare I say you've gained the air of a Queen in the short time we've been apart? If only King Ladras could see you now...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥ……
Entry.EnglishText: Walto...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>…… 隊長は何か国の事を 話していなかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>... Has the commander ever talked to you about what's happening to this nation?

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん……何も…… <Eugene>に話でもあるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Nope, he hasn't... Maybe you should ask <Eugene> yourself?

Entry.JapaneseText: キミはドクター・バースの……
Entry.EnglishText: You're Doctor Barrs's...

Entry.JapaneseText: 隊長から、事件の真相を 聞いた事はなかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did the Commander ever tell you what really happened?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの事件の真相さえわかれば、 隊長は……
Entry.EnglishText: If only the truth surrounding that incident would come to light... That way, the Commander...

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城に何の用か？ 自分が何をしたのか分っているのなら、 二度とここに近寄るな……
Entry.EnglishText: What business do you have at Callegea Castle? If you understood what you had done, you wouldn't show your face here again...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>……おまえも一度は <Blue>王の盾<White>に籍を置いた者……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... You were once a member of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 国への忠義を少しでも感じるのなら、 隊長を説得するぐらいの事をしてみろ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you feel any sense of loyalty to your nation, then you should try persuading the Commander.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここへ何をしに来た？ おまえは自分の立場を わかっていないのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing here? Are you not aware of what sort of situation you're in...?

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀を目当てに 各地から人々が集まっている。
Entry.EnglishText: People are gathering from all over the nation to witness the inauguration ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: そういった旅行客を狙うスリや 強盗なども増えている。 不審者があれば通報するように。
Entry.EnglishText: As a result, there has been an increase in tourists getting pickpocketed or mugged, so please report any suspicious individuals.

Entry.JapaneseText: 間もなくお披露目の儀だ。 何があっても無事にすべてを 終えなくてはならない。
Entry.EnglishText: The ceremony will take place soon. No matter what occurs, we will ensure it goes smoothly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 不審者があればすぐに 我々に通報するように。
Entry.EnglishText: Any suspicious activity should be reported to the authorities immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: この城は、初代国王ゴルドバ陛下の 時代に建設が始まり、第十代国王 パシ陛下の時代に完成したそうだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Construction of this castle began during the reign of the first king, Goldba, and was not completed until the reign of the tenth king, Passy.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヨッツアというガジュマを 見かけたらすぐに報せてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Should you encounter a Gajuma named Yotza, inform one of us immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 間もなく、女王陛下の お披露目の儀式がある。
Entry.EnglishText: Her Majesty The Queen's inauguration ceremony will be held soon.

Entry.JapaneseText: 度の過ぎた行動は 慎むように。
Entry.EnglishText: Please refrain from any excessive behaviour.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、城内ではお披露目の前の 重要な行事が行われている。 お披露目はもう間もなくだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Right now, important preparations for the inauguration ceremony are underway at the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのガジュマに対する 反発が強まっている…… 気をつけるように。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma aggression towards Gajuma is on the rise... Please remain vigilant.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえたちヒューマは あまり街中をうろつくな！ もめごとの原因を作るんじゃない。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey! Watch yourselves out there, Huma! You'd better not cause any trouble!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえと連れの ヒューマどもはどういう関係だ！
Entry.EnglishText: What is your relation to the Huma you're traveling with?

Entry.JapaneseText: この情勢下でヒューマと結託して、 何か企んでいるのではあるまいな？
Entry.EnglishText: You aren't colluding with them on some sort of scheme, are you?

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ヒューマ！ 連れ立って何をしている!? 騒ぎを起こしてみろ。 ただでは済まさんぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma! What you are up to!? If you try causing any trouble, I'll have you rounded up right away!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らガジュマには、ジルバ様が ついてくださっている。
Entry.EnglishText: We Gajuma have Lady Zilva on our side.

Entry.JapaneseText: 薄汚いヒューマどもに へつらう必要などないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: No longer will we need to suck up to those filthy Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ヒューマ！ 連れ立って何をしている!? 騒ぎを起こしてみろ。 ただじゃ済まさんぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma! What you are up to!? If you try causing any trouble, I'll have you rounded up right away!

Entry.JapaneseText: これからはガジュマの時代が来る。 おまえもヒューマなどと手を切り、 ガジュマの誇りを持って生きろ。
Entry.EnglishText: The age of Gajuma will soon be upon us. It's time to sever all relations with Huma and proudly live as a Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマがあまり外を出歩くな。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are to limit their time outdoors.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らガジュマが、ヒューマに 苦しめられる時代は終わった！
Entry.EnglishText: The days of us Gajuma being tormented by you Huma are coming to an end!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちヒューマが、 今までのごとく、ごうまんに 暮らせると思うなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't assume you Huma will be enjoying the privileges you used to!

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴りについて、現在、 軍が全力を挙げて調査中だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The military is currently allocating all resources to investigate the source of these tremors.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無用に騒ぎ立てて 混乱を起こさないよう 注意して欲しい。
Entry.EnglishText: Please remain calm and refrain from causing chaos and disorder.

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りについておまえたちに 教えるような事は何もない！
Entry.EnglishText: I have nothing to tell you about these tremors!

Entry.JapaneseText: 騒ぎ立てて混乱を引き起こせば、 即刻、おまえたちを拘束するぞ。 わかったな！
Entry.EnglishText: If you cause any trouble, you will be taken into custody immediately. Do I make myself clear?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダが沈んだ事で 街中で不安が広がっているが 心配はいらない。
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone in the city is anxious due to the sinking of Razilda, but there is nothing to worry about.

Entry.JapaneseText: 王都たるバルカは、 建国以来、一度も災害に 見舞われた事はないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Throughout its entire existence, Balka has not once suffered a major natural disaster.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが外に出るたびに 衝突や問題が起こる。 さっさと自分の家に帰れ。
Entry.EnglishText: Every time a Huma goes outside, some sort of conflict arises. Return to your homes immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山上空の黒雲について 現在、軍が調査中だ。 くれぐれもパニックにならないように。
Entry.EnglishText: We are actively investigating the dark clouds over Mount Sovereign. Please, remain calm and don't panic.

Entry.JapaneseText: 王都たるバルカは安全だ。 不確かな話を広めて人々を 混乱させるんじゃないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: The Royal Capital of Balka is safe. Do not spread false rumors and cause chaos within the city!

Entry.JapaneseText: 城の中は安全だ。 早く避難するんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: You will be safe within the castle. Hurry and seek refuge there.

Entry.JapaneseText: 各地で混乱が起きている今、 我々カレギア軍は、一丸となって 国のために戦わねばならない。
Entry.EnglishText: With the country currently falling into chaos, the Callegean Army must band together and fight for the sake of the nation.

Entry.JapaneseText: 国を乱す者は、どんな事をしても 排除する……
Entry.EnglishText: Those who attempt to subvert Callegea will be eliminated at all costs...

Entry.JapaneseText: 不審な小柄のガジュマを 見かけたら知らせるように！
Entry.EnglishText: If you encounter a suspicous Gajuma, alert one of us immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: 城門に向かって右の石像は 古代カレギアの戦士、 ミルティンの彫像だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The stone statue to the right of the gate is of Milutin, an ancient Callegean Warrior.

Entry.JapaneseText: かつて<Blue>王の剣<White>と呼ばれる 国王直属の戦闘部隊があった。 その初代隊長が戦士ミルティンだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There was once an elite combat unit under the direct command of the royal family called the <Blue>Royal Sword<White>. Milutin was the first commander of the unit.

Entry.JapaneseText: 国の平和が揺ぎないものとなった後、 <Blue>王の剣<White>は解散したんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Once peace and order of our nation was established, the <Blue>Royal Sword<White> was disbanded.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀が待ち遠しいのは わかるが、<Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>までは ここに来ても何もない。
Entry.EnglishText: While I understand that you are excited for the inauguration ceremony, there's no reason for you to come here until the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王陛下を拝見したいのなら、 おとなしく当日まで待つ事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you wish to be graced by the Queen's presence, then you will have to wait patiently.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀は間もなくだ。 それゆえ、警備も最高レベルの 警戒態勢となっている。
Entry.EnglishText: The inauguration ceremony will be commencing soon. As a result, we have been placed on high alert.

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しでも不審な動きをすれば拘束する。 行動には充分注意するように。
Entry.EnglishText: Any questionable or suspicious activity will result in arrest. Be mindful of how you act.

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ陛下のお披露目の儀は 事情により延期となった。
Entry.EnglishText: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the inauguration ceremony of Her Majesty, Queen Agarte, has been postponed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 改めて日時が決まったら 街で告知されるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: We will inform the public once a new date and time is confirmed.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ貴様？ 文句でもあるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What's with you? Is there a problem?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト将軍からは、 種族差別や対立を起こす者を 徹底的に取り締まるよう 言われている。
Entry.EnglishText: General Milhaust has given us orders to crack down on any individuals engaging in discrimination or causing conflict.

Entry.JapaneseText: 気をつける事だ。 いいな！
Entry.EnglishText: Watch yourself. Understood?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト将軍からは、 種族の差なく、公平に<Yellow>ヒト<White>を 扱えと言われているが……
Entry.EnglishText: General Milhaust has ordered us to treat all <Yellow>Men<White> equal without taking race into consideration, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマたちのヒューマへの 対抗意識や敵対心は、目に余る。 どうしたものか……
Entry.EnglishText: The hostility that Gajuma show towards Huma is egregious. What are we to do...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族意識や対立をあおるような ヒューマの危険分子があれば、 軍に報せるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you encounter any dangerous Huma who are stirring up trouble or instigating racism, then report them to the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: 国の平和を守るためには、 種族主義者たちを徹底的に 叩くしかない！
Entry.EnglishText: The only way we will be able to maintain peace in this nation is by cracking down on all racists!

Entry.JapaneseText: おいヒューマ。 ガジュマを差別するような事を すれば、ただちに拘束する。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma. If you are found to be discriminating against Gajuma, you will be detained immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 差別主義者をかくまった者も同罪だ。 そういう者を知っていたら、 すみやかに軍に報せろ、いいな！
Entry.EnglishText: Anyone who harbors or supports racists will also be considered a criminal. If you know of any such persons, report them to the military immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我々ガジュマは、これまでずっと ヒューマの横暴に耐え、平和を 守り続けて来た……
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma have withstood the tyranny of the Huma while managing to keep the peace for all this time...

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、耐える時代は終わった。 自分たちの手で平和をつかむのだ。 戦いとなろうとも！
Entry.EnglishText: But that time of strife and struggle has ended. We must seize peace with our own hands, even if it means we have to fight for it!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはヒューマなどが 近寄るべき場所ではない。 今すぐ立ち去れ！
Entry.EnglishText: This is no place for the likes of Huma. Leave at once!

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族意識や対立をあおるような ヒューマの危険分子があれば、 軍に報せるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you encounter any dangerous Huma who are stirring up trouble or instigating racism, then report them to the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: 国の平和を守るためには、 種族主義者たちを徹底的に 叩くしかない！
Entry.EnglishText: The only way we will be able to maintain peace in this nation is by cracking down on all racists!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマが共に 行動するのは望ましくない。 すぐにでもやめる事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma and Gajuma living in harmony is unnatural. That kind of crap needs to stop immediately.
Entry.Notes:
This may be too harsh of a translation depending on context.
maybe instead of crap, use something like "folly"?

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬を売っている店も知らないとは この街の者ではないな……？
Entry.EnglishText: You must not be from around here if you don't know where they sell medicine...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何の目的でバルカに入ったか 知らないが、バカな事は考えるなよ。 我ら軍が常に監視している事を忘れるな。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know what your purpose for being in Balka is, but don't do anything stupid. The Callegean guard are always watching.

Entry.JapaneseText: おいヒューマ。 ガジュマを差別するような事を すれば、ただちに拘束する。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma. If you are found to be discriminating against Gajuma, you will be detained immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 差別主義者をかくまった者も同罪だ。 そういう者を知っていたら、 すみやかに軍に報せろ、いいな！
Entry.EnglishText: Anyone who harbors or supports racists will also be considered a criminal. If you know of any such persons, report them to the military immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りについて、 何か情報があれば、 軍まで知らせて欲しい。
Entry.EnglishText: If you have any information pertaining to the cause of these tremors, please relay it to the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: おいヒューマ、地鳴りの事で 何か知っていたら、すぐに 軍に報せろ、いいな！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma. If you know anything about these tremors, inform a member of the military. Understood?

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ崩壊前後の情報があれば どんな小さな事でもかまわない。 軍に報せてほしい。
Entry.EnglishText: If you have any information pertaining to the events leading up to or immediately after the destruction of Razilda, we would much appreciate it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 有益な情報だった場合、 後に報奨が出るぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: If it is particularly informative, you will be rewarded.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが城の近くを ウロウロするな！ すぐに立ち去れ！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are not permitted to loiter around the castle! Vacate the premises immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……情報が錯綜していて 我ら現場には正しい情報が 下りて来ない……
Entry.EnglishText: We're receiving so much conflicting information that I have no idea what's really going on...

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、獣王山で何が 起こっているんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Just what is happening at Mount Sovereign?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが城の近くを ウロウロするな！ すぐに立ち去れ！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are not permitted to loiter around the castle! Vacate the premises immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: 門をくぐり、まっすぐ行った 先に大広間がある。 そこが避難所になっている。
Entry.EnglishText: Seek shelter by going through the gate until you reach the main hall.

Entry.JapaneseText: この近辺でおかしな行動を する者は即刻逮捕する。 うかつなマネはするな。
Entry.EnglishText: Any individual who is acting suspicious is subject to immediate arrest. Take heed and be mindful of your actions.

Entry.JapaneseText: 隊長……
Entry.EnglishText: Commander...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖獣<White>とやらの力を 集めているそうですね……
Entry.EnglishText: So I've heard that you're gathering the powers of the <Yellow>Sacred Beasts<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: さすがは<Blue>四星<White>。 情報が早いな。
Entry.EnglishText: Information travels fast... I shouldn't have expected anything less from a member of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜ…… なぜなのですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Why... Why would you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...You want to know why?

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダで将軍に お会いになられたのなら、 おわかりのはずです。
Entry.EnglishText: If you had met the General in Razilda, I'm sure you would understand.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、あなたが どこにいるべきなのか？ 何をすべきなのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Where is it that you should be right now? What is it that you should be doing?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣などという得体の知れぬものを 追う前に、あなたにはすべき事が あるはずでしょうに!?
Entry.EnglishText: Instead of chasing after something as inscrutable as the Sacred Beasts, isn't there something else that needs your attention?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、ワルトゥ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, Walto!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は隊長と話している。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm speaking with the Commander.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたはドクターを殺し…… アガーテ様を殺し…… 国を混乱に陥れた……
Entry.EnglishText: You killed the Doctor... You killed Queen Agarte... You plunged this nation into chaos...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは反逆者です。 この国の敵です……
Entry.EnglishText: You are a traitor, and an enemy to this country...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたに国を思う気持ちが あるのなら、せめて、私の任務を 邪魔しないでいただきたい。
Entry.EnglishText: If there remains even the smallest semblance of loyalty to Callegea, then at the very least please do not interfere with my mission.

Entry.JapaneseText: 任務……？
Entry.EnglishText: Your mission...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 特別にお教えしましょう。 「聖獣復活を阻止せよ」 これが私に下った命令です。
Entry.EnglishText: Let me let you in on a little secret. I've been given orders to "Prevent the resurrection of the Sacred Beasts."

Entry.JapaneseText: やるってのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: What, are you gonna fight us?!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな事をしている 暇があるのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think I have time for that right now?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ワルトゥはやっぱり <Eugene>に軍に戻って もらいたいんじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Eugene>, don't you think Walto just wants you to rejoin the army and become his comrade once more?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの事件の事、ちゃんと話せば、 前みたいに一緒に……
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe if we talk about that incident, you and him could go back to being friends...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……行こう、俺たちには 俺たちのやるべき事がある……
Entry.EnglishText: ...We've got better things to do. Let's get going.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式は <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>に 行われる事になっている。
Entry.EnglishText: Her Majesty's inauguration ceremony is scheduled to take place on the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式の折には城内も一部解放されるが、 それまでは一般人の立ち入りは禁止だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The palace will be partially opened to the public during the ceremony. However, until then, entry is prohibited.

Entry.JapaneseText: 民間人のカレギア城内への 立ち入りは禁止されている。 すみやかに立ち去るがよい。
Entry.EnglishText: Civilians are not permitted to be on castle grounds. Please vacate the premises immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式は間もなくだ。 開門まで静かに待て。
Entry.EnglishText: The inauguration ceremony will begin shortly. Remain civil and wait for the gates to open.

Entry.JapaneseText: 民間人のカレギア城内への 立ち入りは禁止されている。 すみやかに立ち去るがよい。
Entry.EnglishText: Civilians are not permitted to be on castle grounds. Please vacate the premises immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
